tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyIntensiveTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT,
    task_type TEXT,
    task_time TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ev_charging_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    charging_station_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE peak_demand_reduction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    reduction_amount INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
